price: Dawe! Mu by’ukuri ndatinya ko wazagerwaho n’ibihano biturutse kwa (Allah) Nyirimpuhwe (uramutse upfiriye mu buhakanyi), maze ukaba inshuti ya Shitani (mu muriro).
arabic: يَٰٓأَبَتِ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ أَن يَمَسَّكَ عَذَابٞ مِّنَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ فَتَكُونَ لِلشَّيۡطَٰنِ وَلِيّٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: yāabati innī akhāfu an yamassaka ʿadhābun mina al-raḥmāni fatakūna lilshayṭāni waliyyan
